EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Replaces textareas with an embedded Emacs.

EDITOR_SECTION_TITLE.description: Title of the Text Editor section in Options.

EDITOR_COMMAND_LABEL.description: Label next to the editor command in Options.

TEMPLATE_SYNTAX_DESCRIPTION.message: The template syntax is similar to the shell, except that variables needn't be quoted. Single quotes, double quotes, and variables are supported. The variables are:
TEMPLATE_SYNTAX_DESCRIPTION.description: Description of editor template syntax in Options.

VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION_WINDOW.message: The X11 window id the editor should embed into.
VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION_WINDOW.description: Description of the WINDOW variable in Options.

VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION_PATH.message: The path to the temporary file to read and write textarea contents from.
VARIABLE_DESCRIPTION_PATH.description: Description of the PATH variable in Options.

INVOCATION_SECTION_TITLE.description: Title of the Invocation section in Options.

TRIGGER_LIST_LABEL.description: Label preceding list of configurable triggers.
